verbs.description: WASHINGTON - President Donald Trump [V: is] claiming victory following the adoption of a new NFL policy that could bring disciplinary action for players who kneel or make other protests during

[ARG0: WASHINGTON - President Donald Trump] is [V: claiming] [ARG1: victory] [ARGM-TMP: following the adoption of a new NFL policy that could bring disciplinary action for players who kneel or make other protests during]

WASHINGTON - President Donald Trump is claiming victory [V: following] [ARG2: the adoption of a new NFL policy that could bring disciplinary action for players who kneel or make other protests during]
WASHINGTON - President Donald Trump is claiming victory following the adoption of a new NFL policy that [V: could] bring disciplinary action for players who kneel or make other protests during

WASHINGTON - President Donald Trump is claiming victory following the adoption of [ARG0: a new NFL policy] [R-ARG0: that] [ARGM-MOD: could] [V: bring] [ARG1: disciplinary action for players who kneel or make other protests during]

WASHINGTON - President Donald Trump is claiming victory following the adoption of a new NFL policy that could bring disciplinary action for [ARG0: players] [R-ARG0: who] [V: kneel] or make other protests during
